categories.name: Code

categories.name: Development

prompts.name: Friendly Greeting
prompts.description: A warm, personalized greeting that makes the user feel welcome and valued.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name of the person to greet

prompts.name: Code Review
prompts.description: A thorough code review that identifies issues, suggests improvements, and follows best practices.

arguments.name: code
arguments.description: The code to be reviewed

arguments.name: language
arguments.description: The programming language of the code

prompts.name: Content Analysis
prompts.description: Systematically analyze web content, breaking it down into key components.

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: The content to be analyzed

prompts.name: Deep Analysis
prompts.description: Expand on a previous analysis by diving deeper into information, identifying key insights and relationships.

prompts.name: Explain Concept
prompts.description: A clear, comprehensive explanation of complex concepts tailored to the specified knowledge level.

arguments.name: concept
arguments.description: The concept to be explained

arguments.name: level
arguments.description: The knowledge level of the audience

prompts.name: Markdown Notebook Creator
prompts.description: Develop a comprehensive markdown document for a specific topic, designed for note-taking and in-depth exploration.

arguments.name: notebook_topic
arguments.description: The topic to create a notebook about

prompts.name: Progressive Research Assistant
prompts.description: A step-by-step research assistant that builds knowledge incrementally through iterative questions and analysis.

arguments.name: notes
arguments.description: The initial notes or information to research and expand on

arguments.name: information
arguments.description: Additional context or information to guide the research

prompts.name: Note Refinement
prompts.description: Refine existing notes by improving organization, flow, and clarity without adding or modifying the content.

arguments.name: notes
arguments.description: The notes to be refined and reorganized

prompts.name: Video Study Guide Creator
prompts.description: Create a comprehensive, structured study guide for educational videos that helps viewers follow along and retain information more effectively.

arguments.name: video_title
arguments.description: The title of the video

arguments.name: transcript
arguments.description: The transcript of the video content

prompts.name: Note Integration
prompts.description: Integrate new information from a markdown page into existing notes, merging them smoothly while maintaining a logical structure and avoiding duplication.

arguments.name: notes
arguments.description: The existing notes

arguments.name: new_information
arguments.description: The new information to be integrated

prompts.name: Code Review Chain
prompts.description: A multi-step chain that reviews code by analyzing its structure, identifying potential issues, and suggesting improvements.

arguments.name: code
arguments.description: The code to be reviewed

arguments.name: language
arguments.description: The programming language of the code

prompts.name: Analyze Code Structure
prompts.description: Analyzes the structure and patterns of provided code.

arguments.name: code
arguments.description: The code to analyze

arguments.name: language
arguments.description: The programming language of the code

prompts.name: Detect Code Issues
prompts.description: Identifies potential bugs, performance issues, and code smells in the provided code.

arguments.name: code
arguments.description: The code to analyze

arguments.name: analysis
arguments.description: Previous code structure analysis

arguments.name: language
arguments.description: The programming language of the code

prompts.name: Suggest Code Improvements
prompts.description: Suggests specific improvements to address identified issues and enhance code quality.

arguments.name: code
arguments.description: The code to improve

arguments.name: analysis
arguments.description: Previous code structure analysis

arguments.name: issues
arguments.description: Identified issues in the code

arguments.name: language
arguments.description: The programming language of the code

prompts.name: Content Analysis Chain
prompts.description: A comprehensive analysis chain that processes content through multiple stages: initial content analysis, deep analysis, conversion to a structured markdown notebook, and final refinement.

arguments.name: content
arguments.description: The content to be processed through the analysis chain
